content.detailedDescription:
Driving to work at 4:45 am est and noticed a brilliant light in the eastern morning sky. it was barely above the treeline / horizon, and i lost it going east. (the moon and other celesial bodies move east to west) this object moved in opposition to this.


i have no idea what this was, is or could be? (ultra-secret) technology??? who knows?
content.shape: Boomerang,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: A brilliant light that looked like 3 lights bouncing off each other (expand and contract).

content.detailedDescription:
It was sunday may 24th 2009 at almost exactly 10:15 pm. i say exactly because this is the time that i usually leave for work every night. i work third shift as a police officer and as i do every night while walking to my garage, in uniform, i looked up at the sky to check the weather and gaze at the stars and constellations. it was a clear night and i did not observe any clouds in the sky. it had been a cooler day and i estimate that the temperature was around 55 degrees at the time of this incident. i opened my garage door and stood in my driveway facing westbound. as i looked up in the night sky, almost directly above me, i observed a very bright white spot. it appeared to be about the size of the biggest star that was in the sky, possibly slightly larger. it also appeared to be as bright as one of the brighter stars, say for instance the north star. the object was traveling southbound, very smoothly, not losing or gaining altitude, and not traveling very fast. when i first observed it, like i always do with any object in the night sky, i tried to identify it in my mind. i thought to myself it seems to be moving at the speed of a typical passenger jet, but there were no blinking colored lights and it was far too bright. then i thought, maybe the jet is coming right towards me and the spotlights in front of it are hitting my line of sight just right. but that didn���t seem to make sense as the object was moving southbound, causing me to begin to turn my head to the left to keep it centered in my line of sight. it was far too large to be a satellite and moved too fast. i then thought, maybe our (nasa) space shuttle, but no, that had landed a day before. so here i stood looking at this object, thinking to myself, is this really what i think it might be.., an actual unidentified flying object. i would estimate that i was watching this object for 20 to 30 seconds at most, and then the part i just can���t explain happened. within 2 seconds it dimmed from a bright star like object to absolutely nothing, gone, vanished, while it was still in motion. it almost appeared like someone took a dimmer switch on a light and very steadily, but quickly turned it off. i stood there for a few seconds thinking did that really just happen? so i snap out of it.., wipe the grin off my face, and think, oh it probably just went behind a cloud. no, no clouds in sight, in fact it disappeared very close to a few stars. to convince myself even further i took my high powered flashlight off my duty belt and shined it up into the night sky. no clouds to be seen. so there i stood in my driveway, running late to work as usual, just witnessing this. i felt amazed. if i had the time i would have stood there for a while to see if it would reappear in another location in the night sky, but duty called. 
     while driving to work all i could think about was how i had never seen anything like this before. being close to 30 years old i���ve been looking at the night sky for quite some time. never have i seen something disappear in the manner that this object did. did this object suddenly shoot out into outer space and disappear from my vision? i don���t know. 
     thank you for listening to my story and i urge anyone in the area of my sighting to come forward if you have experienced something similar to what i saw. i would really like to hear from others who may have seen this and submit possible additional information.
content.summary: Bright star like object. a soild light that did not blink, then faded out quickly while in motion.

content.detailedDescription:
There was a very weird screeching type sound when a plane is very low. so as i am into planes i look out of my window and look out.. waiting and waiting this very slow triangular object is flying out side of my house toward i think west or north.

the object was not well seen, but it had four lights. one red that flashed and three white that i think flashed. then i saw it tilt alot towards the right and then the left...

i was pretty shocked and not scared when i saw it.

i lost its visual when it went behind a house and i was not able to see it after. my brother who lives with me heard it but did not see it. i am not sure if anyone else saw it.
content.summary: Triangle four lights red light in middle tilting three white lights meriden, ct.

content.detailedDescription: Im so full of myself i might as well brag. most important of all, i hate people, i hate every person ive ever met. so anyhow i witness nightly ufo sighting for over 3 years. they know when im outside in the middle of the night smoking and blink theyre lights at me and cruise off at impossible speeds. i am so omunicious i can often disect stars from ships hidding among them, i even remember the code to the one i used to own, i watch his hands do it in vision because it is still  my property. couple weeks ago i had a large fleet of like 18 ships moving in sync stopping directly above my house seemingly just to hang out. not a night goes by i do not see a ship. supposidly there are various species of "aliens". i was one of them, obviously i killed myself to be a sh*tting monkey. hahahahaha, i have been denied work by every company, denied sex and dating by every woman although i am a handsome six foot four white man with blue eyes. i was harrassed in high school, only got to tenth grade to read the bible, went to community college and they tried to pick fights with me for no reason at all.......The devil and the unseen spirits have theyre ways.......In conclusion, i hate chicago illinois ......Worst wishes bozos.......Jokes on you now....
content.summary: My little friends

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were all celebrating my nephews 10th birthday, on may 23, 2009. at approx 9:55pm my partner noticed three (3) individual orange-ish/white-ish lights in the sky. he yelled out, "oh my god, look at that!" so we all turned to look. what we seen we weren't prepared for. it appeared to be a triangular "ufo". these three (3) lights looked as if to be fireballs, with tracing firey tails. they were always changing form, from a triangle, to a straight line, and back to a triangle formation. they flew acrossed the sky a bit, however toward the end of the event, they remained stationary. i ran inside to find my camera, and shot some of the final moments on film. the last few seconds they appeared to be falling, as a leaf would. as the "crafts" descended toward the ground, below the tree line, we noticed a plane flying around the same site in which the lights (crafts) were. there were many witnesses (15+). i have had a "ufo" experience once before, however this event is totally unlike anything i have ever seen before.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo over mainville / mason, ohio.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i had just finished washing the family van when my wife commented on two jets flying the opposite ways from each other. a couple of minutes went buy when she again commented on a low flying plane being followed by a ufo.. the ufo was spotted by the whole family when the two oldest ones had just arrived from making a trip to the grocery store. we first thought it was a balloon that someone had released; but realized it wasnt going straight up and realized it was going the same path of the plane. the object was heading west; it was rotating with blinking lights on the bottom. we stayed out there for five minutes till finally we couldnt see it anymore. the ojbject was going the same speed as an airplane....    
i never believed in ufos till that day i witnessed one... 
jesse
content.summary: Metallic object rotating towards the west coming from the east.

content.detailedDescription:
We watched the large star object move from the most western horizon to the most eastern horizon within a minute or less--it was moving very fast--freaky fast.  i'm an experienced enough sky watcher to know that it wasn't a satellite because the object was swerving and was flying at a lower altitude.  the object was an extremely bright/large object in the night sky that wasn't blinking but it was swerving--can't express that enough--it was swerving, not at a fixed orbit or flight path.

didn't make a sound, didn't leave a vapor trail, it just booked really fast across the sky.  faster than a jet, faster than a satellite.   

i watched it fly over salmon creek from vancouver, washington.



1.  we were celebrating my birthday as a family at my aunt's house.  i spotted the object after my younger cousin (18) pointed it out--i was drinking, but she was completely sober and spotted it first.  five other people saw it and everyone came to the conclusion that the object was extraordinary.
2.  we noticed the object because it was moving across the sky at a speed that made us feel uncomfortable because we have never seen anything move across the sky so fast.
3.  initially we entertained the idea that it was a jet plane, but nobody could see any blinking lights on the object, and it didn't make a sound or vapor trails.
4.  the object moved in a straight line but swerved from side to side as it made it's way across the sky.  zig zaged across the sky but in a controlled way.
5.  everyone who experienced witnessing the object was perplexed to explain it--everyone marveled at how fast it moved over us without leaving vapor trails or sound.  before it disappeared the consensus among us was that it was indeed a ufo.
6.  it kept traveling east toward eastern washington.  everyone watched it until it disappeared beyond our vision on the eastern horizon of our sky.  and this was the scariest point of the observation,  this object was capable to travel from one horizon to another within a minute, a minute.  it was remarkable among everyone who witnessed it.
content.summary: Very bright star that moved from east to west at an extremely fast pace.  had it been a jet it would have left vapor trails and noise, but it was silent and clean, it wasn't a satellite because it was at low flying altitude and it was swirving

content.detailedDescription:
I took a walk tonight to get some fresh air and at about 10:10 i came to an apartment complex witch has a large radio antenna near it so there is a large clearing.  i stopped to look at the stars (very few) and i saw what i assumed to be a satellite.  it was moving from north to south so i watched it for a moment.  to my surprise it disappeared from view.  just shrank into nothing.  i thought this strange but continued on without giving much thought to the non-event.  

around 10:30 i looked up.  between the rows of trees on either side of the street i could see a relatively large object (seeming much larger than a plane) slowly moving from south to north in a straight line. it had a large yellow/orange light at either end and seemed to have a dark body in between. at first glance i thought it was a helicopter, but it had no flashing strobe lights or red lights that the helicopters i've seen usually have. 

when i looked closer it was moving extremely slow, taking one or two minutes to cross between the trees on either side of the street. it appeared to be quite low and maybe a quarter mile away.  from by best guess i would say no more than a few hundred feet in the air.  i ran to a park witch has few trees to get a better look at it in the clearing.  i was only a few blocks away from the park but by the time i ran there the object had disappeared out of view.

it had no flashing identification lights and made no sound i could hear. i felt no shock or awe that is reported with many cases.  i was in disbelief at having seen something like this. i tried as hard as i could to explain it away as an optical illusion or some known aircraft but i simply can't.
content.summary: Enlongated object with a single yellow/orange sphere at either end.

content.detailedDescription: We were walking south along the desert trails golf course in the nw edge of sun city west, az. when we first observed (my wife & i) this large, bright object hanging motionless in the western sky about 20 deg. above the horizon. you couldn't not notice it. it was larger and brighter than anything i have ever seen in the sky. the sun had just set and it was still very light out. to describe the size i would say it looked the size of nickel held between your fingers at arms length. even tho i knew it couldn't be a star i looked to the eastern horizon and no stars were yet visable. at around 7:50 pm it was still there as we turned east to return home. there was nothing in the news,on radio or tv. i am 79 years old, was an air traffic controller in the usaf for 18 years. i was also a licensed pilot with  private/commercial/multiengine/instrument rateings. the sky was mostly clear with a few low thin clouds.
content.shape: Circle,  Diamond,  Egg,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like
content.summary: Observed large bright  object in western sky at sunset .

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i decided to walk the dog after diner.It was a clear night,no moon and no clouds,and it was plenty dark outside.As we were walking down the block back to our house,i was looking at the stars and just noticed what i thought was a satelite moving from north to south and told my wife to look up and see the moving white dot.As we were looking and watching i saw another white dot just behind it but not as bright moving the same speed and direction.As they were passing overhead i suddenly noticed another star sized object which was a little bigger and oragish in color that passed right behind them traveling from west to east direction.I dont know for sure if these were satelites or not,but it just seemed strage that two satelites would be trailing each other and another passing behind them going an opposite direction.I dont know how to track satelite trajectory to see if these were satelites.Maybe somone can check on that and see.I allways wanted to see a ufo in person,but sometimes its hard to tell what these objects realy are because they are so high up.I also want to add that these objects did not change colors or blink lights,so i know they were not airplanes.The objects fadaed as they got farther away.
content.summary: Three lights about star sized that looked like satellites but  not sure.

content.detailedDescription: I pulled in the driveway getting home from a friends house i was looking in the sky alot of the ride home. but when i pulled in the driveway i looked across the street and saw a blue and red flashing light, flashing much faster then a plane. it flashed for about 5 seconds after then and then it just either stopped flashing or dissapeared, i remained on my front deck for about 20 seconds looking for it but i had a weird feeling and went inside, ive seen ufo's before at my house alot of times but never while i'm alone, i dont mess with ufo's when i'm by myself.
content.summary: Flashing blue and red light flashing very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was feeding my horses last sunday about 12:30am. i was standing facing west, all of the sudden some very low flying lights caught my eye. i first noticed that the lights were flying very low, and then that they were going way to slow to be an airplane. ���there was a blue, red, and white strobing light and they appeared to have just flown over buffalo. the lights were large and inline with each other, with quite a bit of distance in between all three. the middle light was white and strobed very slowly, and the red/blue lights were on the ends. the lights turned and were coming directly towards me at a diagnal angle.��� the white light was covered with a round, concave, clear, glass-type covering which appeared to be very thick glass, and had some type of circular design on it. the red and blue lights were different than the center light. they were tall and cylinder shaped, more like beacons, and they appeared to be sitting on top of something. they appeared to be covered by a different type of material, it looked more like some type of colored plastic, but transparent enough that the lights underneath could shine through.��� i never saw a shape or even any type of structure behind the lights. within 10-15 seconds the lights had reached the dirt road in front of me, and where crossing over the top of the power lines. it became apparent that the lights were slowing down as they got closer, and were now nearly at a complete stop.��� i turned and ran from the corral to my pickup and jumped inside, which took about 15 seconds, because i was wearing flip flops. once in the pick up i was now facing north, and the lights had moved just behind the corral and had turned south, facing me again. the lights were sitting completely still, hovering, absolutely no movement, other than the strobing white light. the distance between me and the lights at this point was probably around 150'.��� i felt it was a single craft, and judging by the distance of the lights from end to end, would have been anywhere from 25' to 50', i cannot judge distance very well, plus i was busy running to my vehicle.��� i lean more toward��� 40-50'. for about another 5 seconds i fumbled trying to find my cellphone, and staring at the lights in disbelief. this was the most terrifying moment i have experienced, i threw the pick up in reverse, then drove forward, and when i got to the gate leading out of the pasture, i stopped looked over my shoulder, the lights were still sitting in the same place, not moving. i couldn't go towards town without passing close by the lights, so i turned south and laid the pedal down. about a 1/4 mile down the road, i turned and looked over my shoulder, and the lights were no where there, or anywhere in sight. since the incident i have driven behind the corral and a large portion of the grass is laid down, which maybe due to wind current, i took some picturess of that area. i have been fascinated by the ufo phenomenon since the massive sightings in tx/pa in 2008, and thought if i ever saw one, that i would be brave and take pictures and size it up.��� i was so scared and i had an innate feeling that if i didn't leave fast, something bad was going to happen. this is a very small town and i do not want any notoriety,��� if you wish to do an investigation or speak to anybody from this area about this incident, please contact me first. thank you.
content.summary: Close encounter 3 lights blue red  strobing white light  buffalo, ok.

content.detailedDescription:
Living in the country we get clear views of our local skys. on this night it was clear with no clouds. as i looked up, on this night, i noticed a nonflashing light flying right above my home. the light was not high enough to be a plane and what i thought was stranger yet was that it made no noise as it passed over my home. right after it passed over my home i took a picture using my cell phone. in the photo i sent with this report might seem to be a pic of nothing but black sky but i ask you to please use your computer to in large the pic and focus on the light. when you inlarge the pic you will see a strange looking object. after the object flew east for about 5 min. the light just shut off.
it might be nothing but hope this might help in someway
content.summary: Non flashing night light.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting out by a fire(4 of us) when i noticed the fireball. i was looking up at the sky, to the east, and initially  thought it might be a falling star but as it continued i realized that it was orange and lasted too long to be a star. my next thought was a meteor but the last meteor i saw was white.  it was orange, shaped like a ball with a tail. it was falling down. i yelled out to my friends "what is that?" we all jumped up to get a better view because it dropped out of sight due to the tree line. i would say it was visible for a good 10 seconds.  one person was able to see it split into two parts. we also noticed helicopters flying towards it and heard lots of unusual air traffic about 20 min. after it happened (so much so it prompted a drive out in that direction which yielded no further information)we thought it might have been a plane wreck.  i came home tonight and watched the local news and was interested to see a report of a ufo last night in the same general area (this one was 3 white lights in a triangle shape, covered by channel 12 news and shot with a cell phone). this footage was shot over lebanon, ohio which is north of where we thought the fireball and helicopters were (our estimate was that this event was over mason, south of lebanon)
content.summary: Fireball with a tail in eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the back porch looking upward at about a 45 degree angle, i was admiring the stars and i see a white star-like round object moving from right to left at a visual height of about 1500 feet.  at first i thought it was a satellite then realized that this is much lower and brighter.  i was under a table umbrella so i did not see the primary beginning location.  i watched it move about twice as fast as a commercial airliner for about 8 seconds, and after 5 seconds the bright white light dimmed a little, slowly dimming until the light source turned off or disappeared.  too fast for a plane, too bright and low for a satellite.  i've never seen this sort of light and movement in this area after residence of two decades. 
one thing that i must point out is that there have been a curious amount of military maneuvers via helicopter over the past few years, to the point where they are low enough to take a visual image of residents.  i had one fly over my house and stop and shine the search light on my face and move in.  it was completely unnerving and scared the hell out of me.  i have no idea if the to correlate in any way but there are maneuvers and for the first time in my residence here i made the conscious decision that what i witnessed pass in front of me was worthy of report.  thank you.
content.summary: Star-like, bright fast moving anomaly, slowly dims then disappears.

content.detailedDescription: Call me for more info
content.summary: Three large bright lights moving together in unison.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were taking a night walk. i was just looking up at the sky because it was so beautiful out...Every star was shining in the sky.I then noticed a big bright light in the sky moving very slowly in a west to east direction. this light almost looked like a close...Very bright white star. it obviously was not a star...Because it was moving, and it was definetly not a plane. there were no wing lights flashing...It was a white..Solid ball of light. as i was watching this light, it suddenly began to fade away very fast till i could'nt see it anymore. just to mention...We saw a similar light the night before that behaved the same exact way. i would love to have tooken some pictures of them...But i didnt have access to a camera at the time.
content.summary: Big bright light then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My eyes glazed and things seperated i shook it off and looked too the sky....A giant star...Thats always tehre(im always looking) it moved..Slowly so slowly you almost chouldent tell it was moving....My glassses were off but it was big and the light was a white and blue...I was thinking of my own oersoanly faults at the time(for fruedian refrence)....I woke my grandmother and she saw it...Too big to be a plane for the airport nearbye....And way too bright. move over my house....Breif conversation with my gram....I cant speek russian only english (sh) refrence to a dream i had aabout teleportation and actualy cahnging shape to do imporablity of survival in lightspeed travel...(yada yda changing shape combats the effect of the energy reduction this is kind of hard to explain check out austrailian record for teleporting a set of atoms in a proton across asutrailia via fiber optics)...I have blue eyes and blonde curly hair...I know for fact that if you stare at the sun while in a certain eclipse the spectrum will burn you eyes and turn them green with agold ring.
personal opinion....I wanna go home. that or they were ahving techinicle difculties.
content.summary: Another one...2 in  3 weeks.Vt

content.detailedDescription:
The following is the account of the sighting as written by the field investigator of the sighting.

the witness was at home sitting on the front porch of his house which he usually does often to look at the night sky for aircraft coming and going between the nearby airport and military base.  at 22:18 he noticed what at first he thought was a bright star in the eastern sky.  the witness then noticed that the light was not a star, but a moving object.  the color of the object was the same color of a white colored star in the sky, but with no twinkling or strobe effect visible from the object, as it was just a continuous solid light.  the witness described the size of the object to be about the size of a bright star in the night sky.  the object was described by the witness as moving very slowly and parallel to the ground.  after the witness observed this object moving southward for several seconds, the object immediately and with no change in heading or elevation had dimmed in magnitude of brightness down to about the size of a really distant star in the night sky. (see attached sketch drawn by witness and photo taken by me at the location.)  the witness stated that the object was visible about half of the way down from the zenith of the sky.  the object continued to travel southward with no further change in brightness for about a minute to a minute and a half.  the object remained visible until the light of a streetlight in front of the witness��� home to his right had started to obscure the object and then it had become invisible from the light pollution after that.  the witness stated that this was not a shooting star, satellite or any type of aircraft which he was familiar with, as he was in the us air force for eight years and has been interested in aviation since he was very young.
content.summary: A white colored light like a bright star at first, then dimmed to like a distant star, traveling slowly, parallel to the ground, silent and several miles distant.

content.detailedDescription: Was outside my house in the garden with two friends watching the stars as it was a very very clear night when i noticed a dull orange oblong shaped object with wings moving very fast in the sky initially i thought it was a biplane but it was moving faster then expected of a biplane and there was no engine sound at all it looked to be fairly high up in the sky i instantly said "what the hell is that?" and my friends both saw it. it flew by for about 10-20 seconds and then disappeared.
content.summary: Dull orange coloured oblong object with wings flying fast in sky no sound.

content.detailedDescription: Fue un moment listen k  fue muy indiscreta para todos mis amos de k stabamos en la caba���a de oasis de taiwan k 100pre vamos para aya k nunca sabiamos k iv a apreces 25 disc k nos sorprendieron muxo al ver
content.summary: In waiting in sofferning.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my boyfriend to university of michigan for an oral surgery appointment, we were on us 23 north going to our exit, i just happened to look out our front windsheild and was talking about how beautiful a day it was, there were hardly any clouds, only  a few vapor trails from jets and barely any haze. it was a perfect day. then it was just there, it had to be at a very high altitude it looked small, there were alot of planes in the area and you could tell they were definately planes. the ufo howerer did not move at all and just hung in the air, i wastched it intensly and was screaming at my boyfirend we just watched it as long as we could until it disappeared. it just vanished it looked like it got smaller to almost like a point and was gone. the same night my brother also witnessed an orange/red ball of light in the night sky probably around 11:15 pm outside his work, his roomate also witnessed the same object on his way from work, these two sightings took place in coldwater, mi about an hour and a half south of ann arbor.
content.summary: Very brilliant disk shaped silver/white.

content.detailedDescription:
We were on the green playing football (soccer) and i looked up and saw a bronze shape disk hovering. in then whiped out my mobile phone and took two pictures. it then shot away as me and my friends harry and james were astonished.

1. football (soccer)
2. i headered the ball and looked up to see the ball 
3. frizby 
4. hovered for a brief moment then disapeard behind the clouds
5. scared, horrified, shocked, astonished, bewildered, amazed etc.
6. it disapeared behind the clouds
content.summary: I hovered for a brief time pictures have been taken.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving across town to pickup a coworker and was approaching a major cross street. the buildings afforded a good view to the left (east) of the intersection and i looked that way to make sure that no drunks were going to run the light (i had the green. i had to do a double take because i saw three street lights that seemed odd or out of place from the rest of them. when i looked again, i saw that these 3 lights appeared to be moving towards me. i quickly came to a stop and verified this and then pulled into a parking lot and got out of my car. as the craft approached (and they did so very slowly) i noticed that the center craft appeared to be having control problems as it moved in a very jerky fashion. the 3 craft were not directly behind each other but slightly to the right of the craft in front of it. when they were overhead, i could see the underside of them from the reflected light. it appeared that the front of the craft (with the light) was lower than the back but that the edges of the back were at the same level as the front. in this 'raised' area of the middle craft, i could see an 'arm' moving around as if making some kind of repairs. these 3 craft were at the same elevation which was very low, maybe 100 to 150 feet and made no noise that i could hear from almost directly undernieth. two other vehicles stopped and the occupants  also observed these objects. when the objects disappeared over the buildings, i got back in my car and picked up my coworker and raced out to the highway because we had to go in the same direction that these craft were moving but they were gone already.
content.summary: 3 craft moving east to west slowly, no noise.

content.detailedDescription: Hope this upload works--been having strange computer problems since this happened.  mouse/cursor moving on its own  (on a mac and a pc), freezing, wrong text count on comment posts, text while typing jumping lines, etc.  cell phones dropping calls.  warning on security system saying battery failure --which then 'resolved' itself somehow... the time showing on the video information file is wrong too.  the morning after the 5/18 orange ufo sighting the presets on car stereo were wiped out like the battery had gone dead (it wasn't dead or even low)--funny sounds during 'ring' on cell phone call made during sighting on 5/18 that never connected (except to voicemail eventually).  reports of gps problems last week reported on local news.  alot of dropped cell phone calls not usually associated with verizon around here.  extra slow cable internet service too.
content.summary: Same report--trying to upload video converted from blu-ray to mpg 2 file.

content.detailedDescription:
En la noche del 12 de junio de 2008, exactamente a las 8:00pm, estando en la parte de atr���s de mi casa, en compa������a de mi hijo y de su novia, miro hacia el cielo y veo una luz brillante y m���s grande que cualquier estrella, que se desplazaba en direcci���n noreste a una velocidad promedio.  de inmediato le aviso a mi hijo y su novia y nos sorprendi��� el tama���o del mismo y lo redondo que era lo cual nos hizo pensar que no era un avi���n.  cuando miro hacia la izquierda y en la misma trayectoria que el primero viene un segundo objeto exactamente igual que el primero. en ese momento le digo a mi hijo que les tome una foto. en lo que prepar��� la c���mara, el primer objeto fue bajando su intensidad de la luz hasta desaparecer, pero tuvimos la suerte de fotografiar el segundo objeto antes que desapareciera de igual forma que el primero.  la noche estaba completamente despejada por lo que no era posible que desaparecieran detr���s de alguna nubosidad.  le indico entonces a mi hijo que le tome una foto a una estrella que estaba cerca con el prop���sito de tener una referencia para comparar las im���genes.  todo el evento tuvo una duraci���n de no m���s de 30 segundos y la distancia entre los dos objetos desde el punto de vista de nosotros era de aproximadamente dos pies.  no s��� cuantas millas sean entre ellos en el aire.  
le envi��� las fotos a mi hermana que trabaja con programas de computadora ya que es artista gr���fico, para que las ampliara y ver si pod���amos determinar que hab���a sido lo que vimos y la sorpresa fue grande.  el objeto no era blanco sino verde, redondo casi perfecto y dentro tiene algo que parece como un trompo gigante.  pero mayor fue nuestra sorpresa cuando en la foto de la estrella, cuando ya los objetos hab���an aparentemente desaparecido, hab���a un tercer objeto el cual nunca nos percatamos que estaba all���, pues no se ve���a a simple vista.
yo tengo las fotos y me gustar���a que pudieran analizarlas porque me interesa mucho saber exactamente lo que es.  las fotos originales est���n guardadas en la c���mara para que puedan tener la certeza de que son fieles y no hay ning���n tipo de manipulaci���n en las mismas.  solo se ampliaron y se le aplicaron unos filtros para poder distinguir lo que era.
todos los que estuvimos envueltos en este evento estamos en la mejor disposici���n de colaborar con ustedes.
muchas gracias por su atenci���n
aurea alicea negr���n

at night of the 12 of june of 2008, exactly at 8:00 p.M., being in the part of back of my house, in company of my son and his fianc���e, i watch towards the sky and i see a light shining and greater than any star, that moved in northeast direction of a speed average.  i warning to my son and his fianc���e and immediately surprised the size of the himself and the round thing to us who was which made us think that it was not an airplane.  when i watch towards the left and in the same trajectory that first a second object comes exactly just as first. then i say to  my son who takes a photo them. in which it prepared the camera, the first object was lowering its intensity of the light until disappearing, but we had the luck to photograph the second object before it disappeared similarly that first.  the night was completely cleared reason why it was not possible that they disappeared behind some cloudiness.  i indicate then my son to takes a photo to a star that was close in order having a reference to compare the images.  all the event lasted of not more than 30 second and the distance between both objects from the point of view of us was of approximately two feet.  i do not know whichever miles are among them in the air.   i sent the photos to my sister who works with computer programs since she is graphical artist, so that she extended them and to see if we could determine that  what we saw and the surprise was great.  the object was not white but green, round almost perfect and inside it has something seems as i spin a top giant.  but greater it was our surprise when in the photo of the star, when already the objects were apparently disappear, there was a third object which never we noticed that it was there, because it was not seen at first. i have the photos and i would like that you could analyze them because we are interests  knowledge exactly to me what is.  the original photos are kept in the camera so that they can have the certainty that they are faithful and there is no type of manipulation in the same ones.  single they were extended and filters were applied to be able to distinguish what was. all those that we were surrounded in this event we are in the best disposition to collaborate with you. thank you very much 
aurea alicea negr���n
pd i have more pictures than the ones that i put here.
content.summary: Unidentified round object sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
This event was first witnessed by my wife,(kelly) and two children, (jon and kathleen). we live in the sticks, the middle of nowhere. on a clear night we can see the city lights of the small neighboring cities and the lights of the prison which is 7 miles due south of us and 5 miles due east. on this night the three of them were looking out our living room window which is facing south. my wife called out for me to come look at something that they had seen in the sky. now my wife and kids all knew about my story that i just submitted about my ufo sighting when i lived in detroit, and they thought that they too were witnessing something much like what i saw. when i first came to the window and saw what they were seeing i wasn't too sure what it was. however what we all saw was a large cigar shape object with a glowing greeninsh outline slowly moving through the sky. it almost seemed like i could see right through the object, however the outline of the greenish lights was quite clear. what impressed me about the sighting was how the object moved. on first witness the object was moving slowly due east, then it made a 90 degree turn and headed due south. what impressed me was how it made the turn. i'll try to describe. while the leading edge of the object made a 90 degree turn, the "lagging" part of the object continued on it's due east course until it hit the point of the original turn, in which case it too made a 90 degree turn to follow the leading end. it ploated like an ameboa. i thought that maybe i was seeing things, but then the object again changed course. instead of heading due south, it made a 90 degree turn to go due east, and again the "lagging" end continues due south until it reached the point of the turn and then headed due east. it did this type of turn a few times before we could no longer see the object. afterwards i was being pressed by my wife and family to claim that they too have see a ufo, however i remained uncommital, since i'm not sure what i saw, and it certainly was not like the "classical" version of my first ufo sighting.

what i thought was interesting was that the following day on the radio morning show the meteorologist (weatherman) reported that there were many calls the previosly evening from people seeing something in the sky they all thought or presumed to be a ufo. according to the meteorologist what people were reporting was in "fact" "space debri" floating out over another state (kentucky?), and that calls came in from all over the country reporting this event. however this was the last i heard of it.

to this day i'm still unsure what it was i saw, however the unusual movement still sticks out in my memory, and even though my kids were young and are now both in college haven't forgotton the event's of that night.
content.summary: Large cigar shape, with unusual  movements.

content.detailedDescription:
**this report is being entered by asd & fi ralph howard because sighting account was not put into cms by witness but instead was sent to sd tom sheets via email on 4-15-2009. this account is taken verbatim (with minor editing for typos) from that email. case investigation initiated friday april 17-2009.**------------------------------------------------------

i would like to inform you of a sighting i had on april 12, 2009 (easter night).  the time was 9:50 p.M.  
 
i was upstairs in my bedroom watching tv. (my bedroom is in the back of my townhouse.)  i heard some really loud helicopters in the distance, they were so loud i figured they were military choppers.  i occasionally see/hear military helicopters because of dobbins afb.  i have a habit of running to look at them when i hear them.  on sunday night the sound of the helicopters appeared to be louder than the other times.  for some reason they were taking a longer time to get to my general area.  i decided to go and open the blinds to my window and wait for them to pass over my home.  
 
i have a limited view of the sky due to tall pine trees.  i scanned the sky and trees to my right and left waiting to see how many choppers were passing me.  as i looked to my left i noticed a bright white light that was blinking on and off.  i then noticed a red light blinking on my left, i couldn't understand because i waiting for these helicopter to show up.  i turned and looked on my right (a good distance) and i see another red light!  at that point the white light and both red lights stayed on, and the complete shape of a triangle was in my view!  (it was going very, very very slow!!).  i realized that i was viewing this thing from underneath it as it passed over my house, the bottom was just above tree level (very low)!
 
once it passed (very slow pace) i was able to see the whole back side of it.  it appeared light in color maybe light gray, i couldn't tell the height of it but the distant between the back corner red lights gave me the sense that this thing was beyond big!  
 
there were a total of 3 helicopters, one flanked on each side of the triangle and one behind it.  the helicopters didn't appear to be chasing this triangle but more like pacing it.  i heard no sound coming from this triangle, no interference with my tv.  also, the flight pattern was odd because planes don't fly over my house at all. i don't see any planes traveling parallel with holcomb bridge rd. heading toward ga 400/roswell area!
 
i can understand why it took a longer time for the helicopter to fly over me, because of slow the speed they were going.  slow, slow, slow!!
content.summary: After loud helicopters passed, huge, dark triangle hovered very low over mine & adjoining townhouses, hard to see, finally saw 2 red and 1 white lights, moved off very slowly.
